statements: DELETE FROM robot_performance_metrics WHERE performance_metric_name = 'Speed' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM robot_performance_metrics WHERE robot_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655441234' AND performance_metric_name = 'efficiency';
DELETE FROM robot_performance_metrics WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND performance_metric_value >= 0.8;
DELETE FROM RobotMetrics WHERE robot_id = 1 AND performance_metric_name = 'CPU Usage';
DELETE FROM RobotErrors WHERE error_id = 100 AND robot_id = 3;
DELETE FROM RobotMetrics WHERE performance_metric_name = 'Efficiency' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM maintenance_logs WHERE robot_id = 5 AND maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM robot_history WHERE mission_id = 3 AND time_taken > 60;
DELETE FROM robot_status WHERE battery_level < 20 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
